DataElement.preferredName: Chronic Graft Versus Host Disease Joint And Fascia Involvement NIH Consensus Response Criteria for cGVHD Severity Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Information related to the NIH Consensus Response Criteria for cGVHD severity of joint and fascia involvement.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Chronic Graft Versus Host Disease Joint And Fascia Involvement
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A syndrome of immunologically mediated tissue damage that may occur following an allogeneic transplant, and may affect multiple organs with manifestations similar to autoimmune diseases. The onset is usually within three years of transplantation or immunologic manipulation._The connection point between two bones or skeletal elements. The joint may be fixed or movable._An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence._A sheet or band of fibrous connective tissue enveloping, separating, or binding together muscles, organs, and other soft structures of the body._To have a connection by participation or association or use; sharing in an activity or process.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A syndrome of immunologically mediated tissue damage that may occur following an allogeneic transplant, and may affect multiple organs with manifestations similar to autoimmune diseases. Concepts.definition: A syndrome of immunologically mediated tissue damage that may occur following an allogeneic transplant, and may affect multiple organs with manifestations similar to autoimmune diseases. The onset is usually within three years of transplantation or immunologic manipulation.
The connection point between two bones or skeletal elements. The joint may be fixed or movable.
An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence.
A sheet or band of fibrous connective tissue enveloping, separating, or binding together muscles, organs, and other soft structures of the body.

Property.preferredDefinition: To have a connection by participation or association or use; sharing in an activity or process.

Concepts.definition: To have a connection by participation or association or use; sharing in an activity or process.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Specification of human conditions relevant to cancer. This includes observations, test results, history, and other concepts relevant to characterization of human cancer-related conditions. Non-neoplastic conditions of interest are also included.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Joint And Fascia NIH Consensus Response Criteria for cGVHD Severity Score
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The connection point between two bones or skeletal elements. The joint may be fixed or movable._An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence._A sheet or band of fibrous connective tissue enveloping, separating, or binding together muscles, organs, and other soft structures of the body._A tool used to assess response to therapy for chronic Graft versus Host Disease (cGVHD) based on clinical trial findings and recommended by the NIH Chronic Graft-versus-Host Disease Consensus Response Criteria Working Group. The criteria were established in 2005 (Biol Blood Marrow Transplant, 12 (2006), pp. 252-266) and revised in 2014 (Biol Blood Marrow Transplant, 21 (2015), pp. 984-999)._Used of the degree of something undesirable e.g. pain or weather; also, strictness._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Tightness of arms or legs OR joint contractures, erythema thought due to fasciitis, moderate decrease ROM AND mild to moderate limitation of ADL

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Tightness of arms or legs OR joint contractures, erythema thought due to fasciitis, moderate decrease ROM AND mild to moderate limitation of ADL
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Tightness of arms or legs OR joint contractures, erythema thought due to fasciitis, moderate decrease ROM AND mild to moderate limitation of ADL

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Mild tightness of arms or legs, normal or mild decreased range of motion (ROM) AND not affecting ADL

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Mild tightness of arms or legs, normal or mild decreased range of motion (ROM) AND not affecting ADL

Concepts.definition: The connection point between two bones or skeletal elements. The joint may be fixed or movable.
An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence.

Concepts.longName: NIH Consensus Response Criteria for Chronic GVHD
Concepts.definition: A tool used to assess response to therapy for chronic Graft versus Host Disease (cGVHD) based on clinical trial findings and recommended by the NIH Chronic Graft-versus-Host Disease Consensus Response Criteria Working Group. The criteria were established in 2005 (Biol Blood Marrow Transplant, 12 (2006), pp. 252-266) and revised in 2014 (Biol Blood Marrow Transplant, 21 (2015), pp. 984-999).
Used of the degree of something undesirable e.g. pain or weather; also, strictness.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
